Name: Platinum Blonde (creamy)
Ingredients: 25 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
25 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Garnish with dusting of nutmeg grated over cocktail.
Review: This after-dinner sipper maybe creamy but it's balanced rather than sweet with aged rum nuanced by cognac and orange liqueur. Creamy yet sophisticated.
Nutrition: One serving of Platinum Blonde (creamy) contains 163 calories
